document_data.name: Fortitude
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell allowed the caster or a targeted creature to continue functioning despite a fatal injury. The spell ended when the recipient of the spell either dies from their wounds or falls unconscious.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s, the holy symbol of Selvetarm and a few drops of blood from a [[cave bear]].
